mean_cn: adj. 年长的；资格老的，地位较高的；  n. （大学或高中）毕业生
mean_en: for senior citizens (= older people, especially those who have retired from work)
sentence: The senior citizens in the community often have fun talking to each other.
sentence_trans: 社区里的老年人们经常在一起愉快地聊天。
word_etyma: sen年老 + ior表示人 → 上年纪的人 → senior长辈
